# 10 Docs

- [Breaking change](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/10/apidescription-client-deprecated.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where the Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client package has been deprecated.
- [Cookie login redirects are disabled for known API endpoints](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/10/cookie-authentication-api-endpoints.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where cookie authentication no longer redirects to login or access denied URIs for known API endpoints.
- [Breaking change: Exception diagnostics are suppressed when IExceptionHandler.TryHandleAsync returns true](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/10/exception-handler-diagnostics-suppressed.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where exception diagnostics are no longer recorded when IExceptionHandler.TryHandleAsync returns true.
- [IActionContextAccessor and ActionContextAccessor are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/10/iactioncontextaccessor-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where IActionContextAccessor and ActionContextAccessor are marked as obsolete.
- [Breaking change: IPNetwork and ForwardedHeadersOptions.KnownNetworks are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/10/ipnetwork-knownnetworks-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10.0 where IPNetwork and ForwardedHeadersOptions.KnownNetworks have been obsoleted in favor of System.Net.IPNetwork and KnownIPNetworks.
- [IncludeOpenAPIAnalyzers property and MVC API analyzers are deprecated](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/10/openapi-analyzers-deprecated.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where the IncludeOpenAPIAnalyzers property and its associated MVC API analyzers are deprecated.
- [Breaking change: Razor runtime compilation is obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/10/razor-runtime-compilation-obsolete.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10.0 where Razor runtime compilation APIs have been marked obsolete.
- [WebHostBuilder, IWebHost, and WebHost are obsolete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/10/webhostbuilder-deprecated.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where WebHostBuilder, IWebHost, and WebHost are marked as obsolete.
- [Breaking change: Deprecation of WithOpenApi extension method](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/aspnet-core/10/withopenapi-deprecated.md): Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where WithOpenApi extension methods have been deprecated and produce a compiler warning.
